extendedInfo.description: Slash HD is an addictive casual game.Slice your finger to cut the board till the progress bar is full filled,and go to the next levelThere will be more kinds of scarabs when the level increase,slice the board over some percent in one slash, you will get a buff to help you complete the level.This is standard version, if you have beta version please update.Features*96 levels,more comes for free; *3 bonus level,with challenge and fun; *3 kinds of buff,slow down / erase / protect; *Global Gamebox; *Achievements;***PLEASE READ***In order to keep the app 100% free, you will receive the following âSearch shortcut icon on your home screen.Search shortcut on your bookmarks.This will help me bring you more cool apps like this in the future.You can delete the search shortcuts easily (Drag & Drop to the garbage), this will not affect the application in any way.***

reviews.title: How in the world do u pass level 32
reviews.comment: Wtf. How do u pass level 32  its impossible.. Unless u make it easer im rating it 1star. I would even rate it a negative.. But no option in that..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple puzzle slasher
reviews.comment: While it was nothing that blew me out of the water or even a new concept, it does everything that it claims to do. I do have to give it an extra star though for not trying to milk me of my money. Keep up the good work.
reviews.author: Brain Nim

reviews.title: Disapointing
reviews.comment: Not enough levels....need many more...!...

reviews.title: Slash Hd
reviews.comment: I love this game. It keeps ur attention if you want to go to the next level : ) IZZARD- KEEP IT GOING...

reviews.title: Link to ad-free \"pro\" app is a 404
reviews.comment: Pleasant enough for a five minute break, but I wanted to get rid of the splash screen ad, so I clicked on the \"No Ads\" button for the \"pro\" version, which dead ends on Google play or web with a 404. Apparently, there is no \"pro\" version, so they should either provide one or lose the button.

reviews.title: Immediate High
reviews.comment: Simple yet immediately addicting.

reviews.title: Gotta try this
reviews.comment: Addicting and fun! But can\'t get past 96! I\'ve smushed 67 bugs and cannot imagine getting more than that yet still can\'t get to 3rd level... Unless... Is 3rd level still being developed or something? If not how many bugs need to be smushed to pass!?
